description: Talk to the examiner.
Talk to Curator Haig Halen.
Talk to an examiner.

4.step: Search the bushes for a teddy bear.
4.subtitle: Lost and found

description: Search the bushes for a teddy bear.
Take the panning tray.

6.step: Talk to the panning guide and give him a cup of tea.

description: Talk to the panning guide and give him a cup of tea.

7.step: Pan the water until you get a special cup (browse through dialog if stopped).

description: Pan the water until you get a Special cup
Chat dialog

8.step: Pickpocket a workman until you get a skull and specimen brush.

description: Pickpocket a workman until you get a skull and specimen brush.
Chat dialog

9.step: Talk to the green shirt student two times.

description: Talk to the green shirt student two times.

10.step: Talk to the orange shirt student two times.

description: Talk to the orange shirt student two times.

11.step: Talk to the purple shirt student two times.

description: Talk to the purple shirt student two times.
Talk to an examiner to take Exam 1:
Answer #1: The study of the earth, its contents and history.
Answer #2: All that have passed the appropriate Earth Sciences exam.
Answer #3: Gloves and boots to be worn at all times; proper tools must be used.
Talk to the green shirt student.
Talk to the orange shirt student.
Talk to the purple shirt student.
Talk to an examiner to take Exam 2:
Answer #1: Samples taken in rough form; kept only in sealed containers.
Answer #2: Finds must be carefully handled, and gloves worn.
Answer #3: Always handle with care; strike cleanly on its cleaving point.

15.step: Talk to all 3 students and give the female student an opal.

description: Talk to the green shirt student.
Talk to the orange shirt student.
You can obtained an uncut opal from the searching the specimen tray with a specimen jar in inventory.
Talk to the purple shirt student two times to give her an opal.
Talk to an examiner to take Exam 3:
Answer #1: Samples cleaned, and carried only in specimen jars.
Answer #2: Brush carefully and slowly using short strokes.
Answer #3: Handle bones very carefully and keep them away from other samples.

17.step: Search the north and south cupboards to get a specimen jar and rock pick.
17.subtitle: Helping the expert

description: Search the north cupboard to get a specimen jark.
Search the south cupboard to get a rock pick.
Talk to the archaeological expert.

19.step: Use the trowel on the soil until you find an ancient talisman.

description: Use the trowel on the soil until you find an ancient talisman.
Chat dialog
Talk to the archaeological expert.

21.step: Use the invitation on any talk-able Digsite workman.

description: Use the invitation on any Digsite workman with the 'Talk' option.

22.step: Use a rope on the western winch, climb down.

description: Use a rope on the western winch.
Climb down the winch.

23.step: Pick-up an Arcenia root, search the bricks to the east, then climb back up.

description: Pick up an Arcenia root.
Search the bricks to the east.
Climb back up.

24.step: Use a rope on the eastern winch, climb down.

description: Use a rope on the eastern winch.
Climb down the winch.
Talk to Doug Deeping about the rocks.

26.step: Use key and search the chest to get Chemical powder.
26.subtitle: Explosives expert

description: Use key on the chest.
Search the chest to get Chemical powder.

27.step: Use the trowel on the closed barrel.

description: Use the trowel on the closed barrel.

28.step: Use a vial on the barrel to get unidentified liquid.

description: Use a vial on the barrel to get unidentified liquid.

29.step: Right-click and use the unidentified liquid (DON'T EMPTY) and the chemical powder on the archaeological expert.

description: Right-click and use the unidentified liquid on the archaeological expert.
Use the chemical powder on the archaeological expert.

30.step: Grind the charcoal with your pestle and mortar.

description: You can obtained charcoal from the searching the specimen tray with a specimen jar in inventory.
Grind the charcoal with your pestle and mortar.

31.step: Use the ammonium nitrate on the nitroglycerin.

description: Use the ammonium nitrate on the nitroglycerin.

32.step: Use the grind charcoal on the mixed chemicals.

description: Use the grind charcoal on the mixed chemicals.

33.step: Use the arcenia roots on the mixed chemicals.

description: Use the arcenia roots on the mixed chemicals.
Climb down the western winch.

35.step: Use the chemical compound on the brick (not the rocks).

description: Use the chemical compound on the brick

36.step: Use your tinderbox on the brick.

description: Use your tinderbox on the brick.
Pick-up the stone tablet.

38.step: Use stone tablet on the archaeological expert.
38.subtitle: Finishing up

description: Use stone tablet on the archaeological expert.

40.step: Talk to the Curator and give him the certificates for a chocolate cake or fruit blast.

description: Talk to the Curator and give him the certificates for a chocolate cake or fruit blast.
